00027 Topology::Topology() : _db_id(-1), _hasPb(0), 
00028                        _bc(NULL), _nblist(this),
00029                        _isRigid(false), _isEStatified(false)  { }

00031 // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00032 // Clean-Up, Destruct    //
00033 // +++++++++++++++++++++ //
00034 
00035 void Topology::CleanUp() {
00036 
00037     vector < Molecule* > ::iterator mit;
00038     for (mit = _molecules.begin(); mit < _molecules.end(); mit++) delete *mit;
00039     _molecules.clear();
00040     _segments.clear();
00041     _fragments.clear();
00042     _atoms.clear();
00043     _polarSites.clear();
00044 
00045     vector < SegmentType* > ::iterator sit;
00046     for (sit = _segmentTypes.begin(); sit < _segmentTypes.end(); sit++) {
00047         delete *sit;
00048     }
00049     _segmentTypes.clear();
00050 
00051     if (_bc) { delete(_bc); _bc = NULL; }
00052     _bc = new CSG::OpenBox;
00053     
00054     _nblist.Cleanup();
00055     _isRigid = false;
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 Topology::~Topology() {
00060 
00061     // clean up the list of molecules; this also deletes atoms
00062     vector < Molecule* > :: iterator molecule;
00063     for (molecule = _molecules.begin();
00064          molecule < _molecules.end();
00065          ++molecule) {
00066          delete *molecule;
00067     }
00068     _molecules.clear();
00069     _segments.clear();
00070     _fragments.clear();
00071     _atoms.clear();
00072     _polarSites.clear();
00073 
00074     vector < SegmentType* > ::iterator typeit;
00075     for (typeit = _segmentTypes.begin();
00076          typeit < _segmentTypes.end();
00077          typeit++) {
00078         delete *typeit;
00079     }
00080     _segmentTypes.clear();
00081 
00082 
00083 }

00090 Fragment *Topology::AddFragment(string fragment_name) {
00091     int fragment_id = _fragments.size() + 1;
00092     Fragment* fragment = new Fragment(fragment_id, fragment_name);
00093     _fragments.push_back(fragment);
00094     fragment->setTopology(this);
00095     return fragment;
00096 }
00097 
00098 Segment *Topology::AddSegment(string segment_name) {
00099     int segment_id = _segments.size() + 1;
00100     Segment* segment = new Segment(segment_id, segment_name);
00101     _segments.push_back(segment);
00102     segment->setTopology(this);
00103     return segment;
00104 }
00105 
00106 Atom *Topology::AddAtom(string atom_name) {
00107     int atom_id = _atoms.size() + 1;
00108     Atom *atom = new Atom(atom_id, atom_name);
00109     _atoms.push_back(atom);
00110     atom->setTopology(this);
00111     return atom;
00112 }

00114 PolarSite *Topology::AddPolarSite(string siteName) {
00115     int poleId = _polarSites.size() + 1;
00116     PolarSite *pole = new PolarSite(poleId, siteName);
00117     _polarSites.push_back(pole);
00118     pole->setTopology(this);
00119     return pole;
00120 }

00122 Molecule *Topology::AddMolecule(string molecule_name) {
00123     int molecule_id = _molecules.size() + 1;
00124     Molecule *molecule = new Molecule(molecule_id, molecule_name);
00125     _molecules.push_back(molecule);
00126     molecule->setTopology(this);
00127     return molecule;
00128 }

00130 SegmentType *Topology::AddSegmentType(string typeName) {
00131     int typeId = _segmentTypes.size() + 1;
00132     SegmentType *segType = new SegmentType(typeId, typeName);
00133     _segmentTypes.push_back(segType);
00134     segType->setTopology(this);
00135     return segType;
00136 }

00140 // +++++++++++++++++ //
00141 // Periodic Boundary //
00142 // +++++++++++++++++ //
00143 
00144 void Topology::setBox(const matrix &box,
00145                       CSG::BoundaryCondition::eBoxtype boxtype) {
00146 
00147     // Determine box type automatically in case boxtype == typeAuto
00148     if(boxtype == CSG::BoundaryCondition::typeAuto) {
00149         boxtype = AutoDetectBoxType(box);
00150     }
00151 
00152     if(_hasPb) {
00153         if (votca::tools::globals::verbose) {
00154             cout << "Removing periodic box. Creating new... " << endl;
00155         }
00156         delete _bc;
00157     }
00158 
00159     switch(boxtype) {
00160        case CSG::BoundaryCondition::typeTriclinic:
00161             _bc = new CSG::TriclinicBox();
00162             break;
00163        case CSG::BoundaryCondition::typeOrthorhombic:
00164             _bc = new CSG::OrthorhombicBox();
00165             break;
00166        default:
00167             _bc = new CSG::OpenBox();
00168             break;
00169        }
00170 
00171     _bc->setBox(box);
00172     _hasPb = true;
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 CSG::BoundaryCondition::eBoxtype Topology::AutoDetectBoxType(const matrix &box){
00177 
00178     // Set box type to OpenBox in case "box" is the zero matrix,
00179     // to OrthorhombicBox in case "box" is a diagonal matrix,
00180     // or to TriclinicBox otherwise
00181 
00182     if(box.get(0,0)==0 && box.get(0,1)==0 && box.get(0,2)==0 &&
00183        box.get(1,0)==0 && box.get(1,1)==0 && box.get(1,2)==0 &&
00184        box.get(2,0)==0 && box.get(2,1)==0 && box.get(2,2)==0) {
00185 
00186             cout << "WARNING: No box vectors specified in trajectory."
00187                "Using open-box boundary conditions. " << endl;
00188             return CSG::BoundaryCondition::typeOpen;
00189     }
00190 
00191     else if(box.get(0,1)==0 && box.get(0,2)==0 &&
00192             box.get(1,0)==0 && box.get(1,2)==0 &&
00193             box.get(2,0)==0 && box.get(2,1)==0) {
00194 
00195             return CSG::BoundaryCondition::typeOrthorhombic;
00196     }
00197 
00198     else {
00199         return CSG::BoundaryCondition::typeTriclinic;
00200     }
00201 
00202     return CSG::BoundaryCondition::typeOpen;
00203 }
00204 
00205 
00206 vec Topology::PbShortestConnect(const vec &r1, const vec &r2) const {
00207     return _bc->BCShortestConnection(r1, r2);
00208 }

00210 
00211 
00212 bool Topology::Rigidify() {
00213 
00214     if (!_canRigidify) {
00215         cout << endl
00216              << "... ... ABORT: Request to rigidify system, but no QM "
00217                 "coordinates provided. ";
00218         return 0;
00219     }
00220     else {
00221 
00222         // Rigidify segments
00223         vector<Segment*> ::iterator sit;
00224         for (sit = _segments.begin();
00225              sit < _segments.end();
00226              sit++) {
00227 
00228              (*sit)->Rigidify();
00229         }
00230 
00231         cout << endl
00232              << "... ... Rigidified " << _segments.size() << " segments. "
00233              << flush;
00234 
00235         if (this->NBList().size() > 0) {
00236 
00237         // Rigidify pairs
00238         // [ Why this is needed: Orientation matrices for fragments are not
00239         //   not written to the state file, and hence lost whenever a frame
00240         //   is saved and reloaded. When reading in a new frame from the
00241         //   database, pairs are created from scratch based on two segment
00242         //   IDs each. Then the pair constructor is called to check whether
00243         //   the pair is formed across the periodic boundary. If so, it
00244         //   creates a ghost from the second partner. This ghost is a new
00245         //   segment which is just accessible from within the pair, but not
00246         //   from the topology; i.e. it is not stored in any segment containers.
00247         //   Since at this point, fragments do not store rotation matrices yet,
00248         //   the ghost - very much deconnected from its originator - does not,
00249         //   either. Therefore it should not be forgotten here. --- A way out
00250         //   would be to rigidify the topology within StateSaver::ReadFrame,
00251         //   after atoms have been created, but before pairs are created. ]
00252 
00253             QMNBList &nblist = this->NBList();
00254 
00255             QMNBList::iterator pit;
00256             int count = 0;
00257             for (pit = nblist.begin(); pit != nblist.end(); pit++) {
00258 
00259                 QMPair *qmpair = *pit;
00260                 if (qmpair->HasGhost()) {
00261                     count++;
00262 
00263 
00264 
00265                     qmpair->Seg2PbCopy()->Rigidify();
00266                 }
00267             }
00268 
00269           cout << endl
00270                << "... ... Rigidified " << count << " ghosts. "
00271                << flush;
00272         }
00273 
00274         _isRigid = true;
00275         return 1;
00276     }
00277 }

00284 
00285 void Topology::PrintInfo(ostream &out) {
00286         cout << endl;
00287 
00288         cout << "MD|QM Topology info "
00289                 "~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~" << endl;
00290         if (_bc) {
00291         cout << "Periodic Box:        "  << this->getBox().get(0,0)
00292                                 << " "   << this->getBox().get(0,1)
00293                                 << " "   << this->getBox().get(0,2)
00294                                 << " | " << this->getBox().get(1,0)
00295                                 << " "   << this->getBox().get(1,1)
00296                                 << " "   << this->getBox().get(1,2)
00297                                 << " | " << this->getBox().get(2,0)
00298                                 << " "   << this->getBox().get(2,1)
00299                                 << " "   << this->getBox().get(2,2)
00300                                 << endl;
00301         }
00302         else {
00303         cout << "No periodic boundary specified. " << endl;
00304         }
00305         cout << "Database ID:         " << this->getDatabaseId() << endl;
00306         cout << "Step number:         " << this->getStep() << endl;
00307         cout << "Time:                " << this->getTime() << endl;
00308         cout << "# Molecules          " << this->Molecules().size() << endl;
00309         cout << "# Segments           " << this->Segments().size() << endl;
00310         cout << "# Fragments          " << this->Fragments().size() << endl;
00311         cout << "# Atoms              " << this->Atoms().size() << endl;
00312         cout << "# Pairs              " << this->NBList().size() << endl;
00313         cout << endl;
00314 }

00317 
00318 void Topology::PrintInfo(FILE *out) {
00319 
00320     fprintf(out, "Topology Database ID %3d \n", this->getDatabaseId());
00321     fprintf(out, "Periodic Box: %2.4f %2.4f %2.4f | %2.4f %2.4f %2.4f | %2.4f %2.4f %2.4f \n",
00322             this->getBox().get(0,0),
00323             this->getBox().get(0,1),
00324             this->getBox().get(0,2),
00325             this->getBox().get(1,0),
00326             this->getBox().get(1,1),
00327             this->getBox().get(1,2),
00328             this->getBox().get(2,0),
00329             this->getBox().get(2,1),
00330             this->getBox().get(2,2) );
00331 
00332     fprintf(out, "\tStep number %2.4f \n", this->getStep());
00333     fprintf(out, "\tTime        %7d \n", this->getTime());
00334     fprintf(out, "\t# Molecules %7d \n", this->Molecules().size());
00335     fprintf(out, "\t# Segments  %7d \n", this->Segments().size());
00336     fprintf(out, "\t# Atoms     %7d \n", this->Atoms().size());
00337     fprintf(out, "\t# Pairs     %7d \n", this->NBList().size());
00338 
00339 }
00340 
00341 
00342 void Topology::WritePDB(FILE *out, string tag) {
00343 
00344     if (tag == "segments") {
00345 
00346     vector < Segment* > :: iterator seg;
00347     for (seg = _segments.begin(); seg < _segments.end(); ++seg){
00348          int id = (*seg)->getId();
00349          string name =  (*seg)->getName();
00350          name.resize(3);
00351          string resname = (*seg)->getMolecule()->getName();
00352          resname.resize(3);
00353          int resnr = (*seg)->getMolecule()->getId();
00354          vec position = (*seg)->getPos();
00355 
00356          fprintf(out, "ATOM  %5d %4s%1s%3s %1s%4d%1s   %8.3f%8.3f%8.3f%6.2f%6.2f      %4s%2s%2s\n",
00357                  id,                    // Atom serial number           %5d
00358                  name.c_str(),          // Atom name                    %4s
00359                  " ",                   // alternate location indicator.%1s
00360                  resname.c_str(),       // Residue name.                %3s
00361                  "A",                   // Chain identifier             %1s
00362                  resnr,                 // Residue sequence number      %4d
00363                  " ",                   // Insertion of residues.       %1s
00364                  position.getX()*10,    // X in Angstroms               %8.3f
00365                  position.getY()*10,    // Y in Angstroms               %8.3f
00366                  position.getZ()*10,    // Z in Angstroms               %8.3f
00367                  1.0,                   // Occupancy                    %6.2f
00368                  0.0,                   // Temperature factor           %6.2f
00369                  " ",                   // Segment identifier           %4s
00370                  name.c_str(),          // Element symbol               %2s
00371                  " "                    // Charge on the atom.          %2s
00372                  );
00373 
00374     }
00375     } /* exit tag segments */
00376 
00377     else {
00378         ;
00379     }
00380 }
